CHAPTER.VERS: Hihte pen Jordan galkhat gamlak, Suf galkhat Arabah gam sung, Paran le Tofel, Laban, Hazeroth le Dizahab kikalah Moses in Israel-te khempeuh tungah a gen thute ahi hi.
Tua mun pen Horeb panin Seir Mual tawnin Kadeshbarnea lamah ni sawm le ni khat paina ahi hi.

Heshbon gamah a teeng Amor kumpipa Sihon le Ashtaroth le Edrei gamah a teeng Bashan kumpipa a zawh khit ciangin, a kum sawmlina, kha sawm le kha khatna, a ni masa ni-in, amaute’ tungah thupiakna-inTopain ama tungah a piak bangbangin Moses in Israel mite tungah a gen hi.Topa
Moab gam Jordan galkhat ah Moses in hih thu gentel a,
“Horeb gam sungahTopai Pasian in eite’ kiangah, ‘Hih mualah sauvei na om khinzo uh hi.Topa

Kithawi-in na khualzin uh kipankik unla, Amor mite’ mual tung gam le Arabah kiim, mual tung gam, lei niamna gam, Negeb gam khempeuh le Kanaan mite’ gam tuipi gei le Lebanon, gun golpi ahi Eufratis gun dongin pai un.
En un, note’ mai-ah leitang ka koih zo hi. Pai unla,Topain na pate uh Abraham, Isaac, Jakob le amau’ nunga a suanlekhakte uh tungah piak dingin a ciam leitang luah un,’ hong ci hi.Topa
“Tua hun laitakin note kiangah, ‘Kei guak bek in note kong en zo kei ding hi.
Topana Pasian un note tampi hong phasak zo hi. En un, note tuhunin vantung aksite zahin tampi na pha uh hi.Topa
Topa,na pate uh Pasian in tu-a zah tulin note hong bawl henla, note tungah hong ciamsa bangin thupha hong pia tahen!Topa,
Kei guak in note’ thu kineihnate siansak nading tavuan lianpi bangci puak zawh ding ka hi hiam?
Na minam uh tawh a kizui-in a pil, thu thei, thuphawksa mite teel unla, note’ lutangin amaute ka koih ding hi,’ kong ci hi.
Note in, ‘Nangma hong gen thu pen kote adingin hoih hi,’ ci-in nong dawng uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na minam lutang uh ahi, a pil thu phawksa mite ka la a, note’ tungah lutangin a tul uk, a za uk, a sawmnga uk, a sawm ukte le uliante na minam khempeuh sung uhah ka koih hi.
“Tua hun laitakin na thukhente uh ka thuhilh a, ‘Na sanggamte uh thu neihte za unla, mi khat le a sanggampa ahi a, amah tawh a om khualmipa tawh ahi zongin thu a mantakin khen un.

Thukhenna-ah angvan na nei kei ding uh hi. A neu le a liante a kibangin a thu na ngai ding uh a, maitang zahtak tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukhenna pen Pasian-a’ ahi hi. Note adingin a haksa lua thute kei kiangah nong paipih ding uh a, keimah in tua thu ka za ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Amaute’ hih ding na khempeuh tua hunin amaute kiangah thu ka pia hi.

“Tua ciangin Horeb gam panin i ding khia a,Topai Pasian in hong thupiak bangin Amor mite mual tung gam zuatna lamkalah note’ muhsa a lian a lauhuai sehnel gam i nawk khit ciangin Kadeshbarnea i tung hi.Topa
Tua ciangin note’ kiangah, ‘Topai Pasian in eite hong piak Amor mite’ mual tung gam na tung khin uh hi.Topa
En un,Topana Pasian un note’ mai-ah leitang koih zo hi.Topa,na pate uh Pasian in note tungah hong gensa bangin paito-in luah un. Lau kei unla, lungkia kei un,’ kong ci hi.TopaTopa,
“Tua ciangin na vekpi-un ka kiangah nong pai uh a, ‘Eite adingin gam va enin, i paitoh nading lampi le i zuat ding khuapite hong genkik thei ding eite’ mai-ah mi sawl ni,’ nong ci uh hi.
“Tua thu hoihtuak ka sa a, minam khatah khat, note mi sawm le nih kong la hi.
Amaute kithawi-in mual tung gamah paito uh a, Eshkol kuamah pai-in va en uh hi.

Amaute in tua gam singgah pawlkhat a khutun hong tawi-in i kiangah hong tunpihsuk uh a, amaute in eite kiangah thu hong zasakkikin, ‘Topai Pasian in eite hong piak gam pen leitang hoih ahi hi,’ hong ci uh hi.Topa
“Ahi zongin note paito nuam loin,Topana Pasian un hong thupiak na nial uh hi.Topa
Na puanbukte uh sungah na phun uh a, ‘Topain eite hong mudah ahih manin eite a hong susia ding Amor mite’ khut sungah hong pia dingin Egypt gam panin eite hong pai khiatpih hi.Topa

Koi lai-ah paito ding ihi hiam? I sanggamte in i lungsim hong siasak khin uh a, “A mite ei sangin lian zaw-in sang zaw uh hi. A khuapite lianin van banin ki-um hi. Tua tham loin Anak mite tua munah ka mu uh hi,” hong ci uh hi,’ na ci uh hi.
“Tua ciangin note kiangah, ‘Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un.

Egypt gam sungah note’ mit muhah a hih bangin, mi khat in a tapa a puak bangin hih mun na tun matengun lam tawntung ahTopana Pasian un note hong puak na muhsa uh sehnel gam a mah bangin, note’ mai-ah a paiTopana Pasian un note adingin hong dosak ding hi,’ kong ci hi.TopaTopa

Ahi zongin hih bang thu om hinapi-in, na puanbuk lamna mun ding uh hong lak ding le na pai nading lampi uh hong lak dingin zanin mei, sunin meii tawh note’ mai lampi-ah a paiTopana Pasian uh note in na um kei uh hi.Topa
“Topain note’ thu hong za a, a heh suakin kiciam a,Topa

‘Hih a gi lo khang mite khat beek in, na pate uh tungah piak dinga ka ciam gam hoih na mu kei ding uh a, Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb bek in tua gam mu ding hi. Amah in a lungsim khempeuh tawhTopazui ahih manin amah le a tate tungah ama totsa leitang ka pia ding hi!’ a ci hi.Topa
Note’ hangin kei tungah zongTopaheh a, ‘Nang zong tua gamah na pai kei ding hi.Topa
Nun’ tapa Joshua, nangma mai-ah a ding pa lut ding hi. Amah hanthawn in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Israel mite tua gam luahsak ding hi.

“Tua tham loin galte’ mat suak ding hi, na cih uh na taneute uh le, tuhun laitakin a sia le a pha a khen thei nai lo na tate uh, tua gamah pai dinga, amaute tungah tua gam pia-in, amaute in tua gam luah ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note na hih uhleh, kihei unla, San Tuipi lam manawhin sehnel gamah pai un,’ hong ci hi.

“Tua ciangin note in kei nong dawng uh a, ‘Topa’tungah ka khial khin uh hi.Topai Pasian in hong thupiak bang teekteekin paito-in i do ding hi,’ nong ci uh hi. Na milipun na galhiam uh tawh na kithawi uh a, mual tung gamah paitoh ding na baih ngaihsut uh hi.Topa’Topa
“Tua cianginTopain kei kiangah, ‘Amaute kiangah gen in: Note lakah kei om lo ka hih manin kuanto kei unla, do kei un. Tua bangin kuanto le-uhcin na galte uh na lel ding uh hi, ci in,’ hong ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin note kiangah kong gen a, note in na ngai nuam kei uh hi.Topa’thupiakna na nial uh a, mual tung gamah na kuanto hamtang uh hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin tua mual tung gamah a teeng Amor mite hong kuanin, Seir gam Hormah ciang dongah khuai bangin hong delhin hong zo uh hi.
Note hong ciahkikinTopa’mai-ah na kap uh hi. Ahih hanginTopain na aw uh hong ngai loin, a bil zong hong ngat lo hi.Topa’Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tua thu hangin ni tampi sung Kadesh munah na om uh hi.
“Tua cianginTopain kei tungah hong gen bangin eite kihei-in San Tuipi lam manawhin sehnel gamah i pai a, ni tampi sung Seir Mual tung gamah i pai kawikawi hi.Topa
“Tua cianginTopain kei tungah,Topa
‘Hih mual kiimah sauvei khop na pai khinta uh hi; leilu lamah kihei un.
Mite’ tungah hih bangin thu pia in: Seir gamah a teeng Esau’ suanlekhak, na behte uh gam sung a nawk ding na hi uh hi. Amaute in note hong kihta ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note kidawm un.

Amaute tawh kiseel kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ leitang themkhat zong no kong pia peuhmah kei ding hi. Esau’ neih dingin ama tungah Seir Mual pia khin ka hih manin khe a ta khopzah zong no kong pia kei ding hi.
Na nek ding uh an amaute’ tung panin sum tawh na lei ding uh a, na dawn ding uh amau’ tui zong sum mah tawh na lei ding uh hi.

“‘Bang hang hiam cih leh na sepna khempeuh uhahTopana Pasian un note thupha hong pia hi. Hih a zai sehnel gam na paina uh amah in hong thei hi. Hih kum sawmli sungTopana Pasian uh no tawh hong om hi. Bangmah na kisam kei uh hi, ci-in gen in,’ hong ci hi.TopaTopa
“Tua ahih ciangin Seir gamah a teeng Esau’ suan i behte le Elath le Eziongeber khua pan hong kipan Arabah lampi panin i pai khia suak hi.“Tua ciangin eite kihei-in Moab gam lamah i pai hi.

Topain kei kiangah, ‘Amau’ leitang na neih dingun note’ tungah hong pia lo ding ka hih manin Moab mite gimsak kei unla, amaute tawh galin kido kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh a neih dingun Lot’ suanlekhakte tungah Ar khua ka piazo hi,’ hong ci hi.Topa
(Anak mite zahin a tun a sang, a lian, a tam Emim mite tua lai-ah teeng ngei hi.
Anak mite mah bangin amaute zong Refaim mite kici a, ahih hangin Moab mite in Emim ci uh hi.

Hor mite zong Seir-ah nidangin teeng ngei a, ahih hanginTopain amaute’ tungah a piak amau’ leitang tungah Israel mite in a hih mah bangin, Esau’ suanlekhakte in amaute suankhia-in susia uh a, amau’ munah teeng uh hi.)Topa
“Tua cianginTopain, ‘Tu-in ding unla Zered lui kantan un,’ hong cih bangin Zered lui i kantan hi.Topa

Amaute tungahTopaa kiciam mah bangin galsim mi ahi tua khangmite khempeuh gam sungah a sih khit dong ahi, Kadeshbarnea i nusiat a kipan Zered lui i kantan dong kikal kum sawmthum le kum giat ahi hi.Topa
Amaute a bei khit mateng gamlakah amaute a susia dinginTopalangpang takpi hi.Topa
“Tua ahih ciangin mihingte lak panin galsim mite bei-in a sih khit ciangin
Topain kei kiangah,Topa
‘Tuni-in Ar khua san takah Moab gamgi a kantan ding na hi uh hi.

Ammon mite’ leitang na neih dingun khat zong hong pia lo ding ka hih manin, Ammon mite’ gamgi na nai uh ciangin amaute gimsak kei unla, amaute tawh kido kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh a neih dingun Lot’ suanlekhakte tungah ka pia khin hi,’ hong ci hi.

(Tua pen Refaim gamgi ci-in zong kithei ngei hi. Refaim mite tua lai-ah teeng ngei a, ahih hangin Ammon mite in amaute pen, Anak mite bangin lianin a tun a sang ahi Zamzummim mite ci uh hi. Ahih hanginTopain amaute’ mai-ah tua mite susia hi. Amaute in tua mite suan khia uh a, amau’ munah teeng uh hi.Topa
Amah in Seir-ah a teeng Esau’ suanlekhakte adingin amaute’ mai-ah Hor mite a suksiat mah bangin amaute in tua mite susia-in tuni dongin amau’ munah teeng uh hi.
Gaza ciang dong khuaneute-ah a teeng Avvim mite ahihleh Kaftor pan a hong pai Kaftor mite in susia-in amau’ munah teeng uh hi.)

“Moab gam sung i khen cianginTopain, ‘Ding un, na khualzin uh kipan unla, Arnon kuam kantan un. En un, Heshbon kumpipa, Amor mi Sihon le ama leitang note’ khut sungah kong piazo hi. Amah suankhiat ding kipan unla, gal sungah amah tawh kido un.Topa
Nomau’ thu za-in note’ hangin liingin a gim ding ahi, mun khempeuh ah a om mite’ tungah note hong kikihtakna le note’ hanga launa ka tunsak ding tuni-in ka kipan ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Kedemoth sehnel gam panin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ kiangah kilemna ding thu genin kamtai ka sawl a,
‘Na gam sung hong nawksak in. Lampi bekah ka pai ding uh a, taklam ahi a, veilamah ahi zongin ka pial kei ding uh hi.
Ka nek ding uh an sum tawh lei dingin nong zuak dinga, ka dawn ding uh tui sum tawh lei dingin nong pia ding hi. Khe tawh hong nawksak bek in.
Jordan kantaninTopaka Pasian un kote hong piak leitangah ka tun matengun Seir-a a teeng Esau’ suante le Ar-a a teeng Moab mite in kei hong paisak mah bangun hong paisak in,’ ka ci hi.Topa

“Ahih hangin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon in eite hong paisak lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuhuna mah bangin na khut sung uhah amah hong piak theih nadinginTopana Pasian un a lungsim khauhsakin, amah paupeengsak hi.Topa
“Tua cianginTopain kei kiangah, ‘En in, Sihon le a leitang nang tungah piak kong kipan khinzo hi. Ama leitang na luah theih nadingin suankhiat kipan in,’ hong ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Sihon le a mite khempeuh eite a do dingin Jahaz-ah hong pai uh hi.
Topai Pasian in amah hong pia a, amah le a tapate le a mi khempeuh i zo hi.Topa
Tua hunin a khuapi khempeuh i la a, a khuapi khempeuh, papi, nupi le naupangte i susia mai mang a, bangmah i siit kei hi.
I laksa a khuapi sunga van kinusiate tawh a ganhingte uh eima adingin i la bek hi.
Arnon kuam mong a a om Aroer le tua kuam sunga om khuapi Gilead ciang dongah eite adingin khuapikulh a sanglua khat beek om lo a,Topai Pasian in a vekpi-in eite’ khut sungah hong pia hi.Topa
Ammon mite’ leitang ahi Jabbok gun pang khempeuh le mual tung gam khuapite leTopaeite’ Pasian in hong khamna munte bek i va neh kei hi.Topa
“Tua ciangin eite kihei-in Bashan lamah i paito a, Bashan kumpipa Og le ama mite khempeuh Edrei-ah eite a do dingin hong kuan khia hi.

Ahih hanginTopain kei kiangah, ‘Amah kihta kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah le a mite khempeuh le a leitang nangma khut sungah kong pia khinzo hi. Heshbon-ah a teeng Amor kumpipa Sihon na bawl bangin ama tungah na bawl ding hi,’ hong ci hi.Topa
“Tua ahih cianginTopai Pasian in eite’ khut sungah Bashan kumpipa Og le a mite khempeuh zong hong pia a, ama adingin mi khat beek a suakta nawn lo dingin i vatmai hi.Topa
Tua hunin a khuapite khempeuh uh i la a, amau’ kiang pan i lak loh khuapi khat zong om lo hi. Tua banga i lakte pen Bashan gam a Og kumpi gam sung, Argob gambup, khuapi sawmgukte ahi hi.
Kulhpi-a ki-um lo khuaneu tampite sim loh, hih khuapite khempeuh kulh sangpi, kongpi le sikzawlte tawh a muanhuai takin a kibawl ahi hi.
Heshbon kumpipa Sihon i bawl bangin amaute i susia mang a, a khuapi khempeuh, papi, nupi le naupangte i susia hi.
Ahih hangin a ganhing khempeuh le khuapi sunga van kinusiate i la hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin tua hun laitakin, Jordan galkhat a om Amor kumpi nihte’ khut sung pan, Arnon kuam panin Hermon Mual dong
(Sidon mite in Hermon pen Sirion ci a, Amor mite in Senir ci uh hi),
mualzang khuapite khempeuh le Gilead gam khempeuh le Bashan gam khempeuh, Salekah le Edrei dong, Bashan-a om Og kumpi gam khuapite i la hi.

(Bang hang hiam cih leh Bashan kumpipa Og bek Refaim gam sungah a omlai ahi hi. Ama lupna a han pen suang han hi a, Ammon mite’ khuapi Rabbah-ah tua han omlai hi lo ahi hiam? Tua han a sauna pi sawm le li dektak hi a, a zaina pi guk ahi hi.)
“Tua hunin hih leitang i luah ciangin, Reuben mite le Gad mite tungah Arnon kuam mong a a om Aroer pan le Gilead mual tung gam kimkhat a khuapite tawh ka pia hi.
Gilead gam a omlai teng le Argob gam khempeuh ahi, Og kumpi gam, Bashan gam khempeuh, Manasseh minam kimkhatte tungah ka pia hi. (Bashan gam buppi pen Refaim leitang kici hi.
Manasseh mi Jair in Bashan kici Argob gam khempeuh, Geshur mite le Maakath mite’ gamgi dong la a, tua sunga khuaneu minte ama min tamsakin tuni donga a kip Havvothjair a phuak hi.)
“Makhir tungah Gilead ka pia a,
Reuben mite le Gad mite tungah Gilead panin Arnon kuam dong, gamgi dingin a kuam laita, Ammon mite’ gamgi ahi Jabbok gun dong tawh ka pia hi.
Arabah gam zong, a gamgi dingin Jordan tawh, Khinnereth pan nisuahna lama om Pisgah mual pang nuai-a Ci Tuipi ahi Arabah tuipi ciang dong amaute ka pia hi.
“Tua hunin note thu kong pia a, ‘Topana Pasian un na neih dingun hih leitang hong piazo hi. Na galhang mite khempeuh uh galhiam tawh kithawi-in Israel mi na sanggamte uh mai-ah va kuan ding hi.Topa
Ahih hangin na zite, na taneute le na ganhingte uh (ganhing tampi na neih uh ka thei hi) note kong piaksa khuapite-ah om ding uh a,

Topain note hong piak bangin na sanggamte uh tungah lungsim tawlngakna pia-in,Topana Pasian un Jordan galkhat ah amaute a piak leitang amaute in zong a luah matengun na huh ding uh hi. Tua ciangin note kong piaksa ahi na neihsa ciat uhah note khempeuh na ciah ding uh hi,’ kong ci hi.TopaTopa

“Tua hun laitakin Joshua thu ka pia a, ‘Topana Pasian in hih kumpi nihte’ tungah a bawlte khempeuh na mit in mu khin a, na nawk lai ding kumpi gam khempeuh tungah zongTopain tua mah bangin hih ding hi.TopaTopa
Amaute na kihta kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang a’ dinga hong dosak pa penTopana Pasian ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.Topa
“Tua hunin keimah inTopa’tungah ka thum a,Topa’

‘TopaPasianaw, na liatna le na thahatnate na nasem pa’ tungah lah ding a hong kipan pan bek na hi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh vantung hitaleh leitungah hitaleh nangma hih bangin tua bang nasep leh a vanglian gamtatna a hih thei bang pasian om ahi hiam?Pasian
Kei hong paisak inla, Jordan galkhat a om gam hoih, tua mual tung gam hoih le Lebanon hong musak in, ci-in kong thum hi,’ ka ci hi.
“Ahih hangin note’ hangin kei’ tungahTopaheh a, ka thunget hong pia lo hi.Topain kei kiangah, ‘Pha zo hi; hih thu kei kiangah hong gen nawn kei in.TopaTopa
Pisgah mual dawnah paito inla, nitumna lam, leilu lam, leitaw lam le nisuahna lamah khuadakto inla, na mit tawh gal et in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in hih Jordan na kantan kei ding hi.
Ahih hangin Joshua thu pia inla, hanthawnin thakhauhsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite’ mai-ah amah pai dinga, nangmah in na muh ding leitang amaute luahsak ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Bethpeor gal-a kuam sungah i taam lai hi.
“Tu-in Israel-te aw, note nungta-in,Topa,na pate uh Pasian in note hong piak leitangah va pai-in na luah theih nadingun note kong hilh thukhamte le ngeina kipte don unla zui un.Topa,
Topana Pasian un hong piak ahi keima hong thugente na zuih theih nadingun no kong thupiakte behlap loin, zong na khiam kei ding uh hi.Topa
Na mit un Baalpeor-ahTopa’hihna mu khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na Pasian un note’ lak panin Peor-a Baal a zui mi khempeuh susia a,Topa’
ahih hanginTopana Pasian uh a lenkipte khempeuh tuni-in na hinglai uh hi.Topa
“En un, note in a luah dingin na lutna uh gam sungah na zuih dingunTopaka Pasian in kei hong thupiak bangin thukhamte le ngeina kipte kong hilh khinzo hi.Topa

Tuate zui unla, sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thukhamte khempeuh a zak uh ciangin, ‘Hih minam liante pen a pil thu thei taktak hi,’ a ci ding uh mite’ muhna-ah hih thu pen nomau’ pilna le nomau’ theihna hi ding hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh eite inTopai sap hun simin eite’ kiangah i Pasian hong nai zahin tua bang pasian a nei minam lian koi-ah om ahi hiam?Topa
Tuni-in note kong hilh thute bangin thukham le ngeina kip a man a nei minam lian koi-ah om ahi hiam?

“Na mit un a muhsa nate na nuntak sungun mangngilh kha-in, na lungsim panun pai khia kha ding ahih manin limtakin ngaihsunin hoihtakin kikem un. Horeb-aTopana Pasian uh mai-ah na din ni-unTopain kei kiangah, ‘Leitungah a nuntak laiteng uh amaute in kei hong kihtakna ding le amaute in a tate uh a hilhsawn theih nadingun keimah in amaute tungah ka thute ka zaksak theih nadingin ka kiangah mite hong khawm in,’ hong cihna thu, na tate uh le na tate uh tate’ tungah kitheisak un.TopaTopa
“Mei in mual kaang in van laizang dong banto-in, khuamial le meii le khuazing in a tuamcip laitakin note a nai-ah hong pai-in mual bulah na ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mei sung paninTopain note’ kiangah thu hong gen hi. Note in awging na za uh a, ahih hangin bangmah mu loin, awging bek a om hi.Topa
Thupiak Sawmte ahi note’ hih dinga hong thupiak ama thuciamna note’ tungah hong gen a, amah in suangpek nih tungah tuate a gelh hi.
Note in na luah ding uh gam sungah na zuih theih nadingun, thukhamte le ngeina kipte note kong hilhna ding tua hun laitakinTopain kei thu hong pia hi.Topa
“Tua ahih ciangin note hoihtakin kidawm un. Horeb-ah mei sung paninTopain note’ tungah thu hong gen ni-in bangmah mu lo na hih manun,Topa
note adingin lim khat peuhpeuh, pasal tawh a kibang hitaleh numei tawh a kibang hitaleh,
leitunga om ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh a kibang hitaleh, huihlaka leeng kha a nei vasa khat peuhpeuh tawh a kibang hitaleh,
leitungah a bokvak khat peuhpeuh tawh a kibang hitaleh, leinuai-ah a om tui sunga ngasa khat peuhpeuh tawh a kibang hitaleh, a kiseek milim bawlna tawh a sia-in na gamtat khak loh nadingun kidawm un.

Note in na mit uh tawh vantung lam ento-in, ni le kha le aksite, vantung na khempeuh na muh uh ciangin, mun khempeuh a mite’ tungahTopana Pasian un a piak nate’ lamah kihei-in tuate bia-in a na na sep khak loh nading uh kidawm un.Topa
Ahih hanginTopain tuni-a bangin sik meikhuk tawh a kibang Egypt panin ama neih mi dingin note hong la-in hong pai khiatpih khin hi.Topa
Tua tham loin note’ hangin kei’ tungahTopaheh a, keimah in Jordan kantan loinTopana Pasian un note’ gamh dingin hong piak leitang hoihah ka lut loh nadingin a kiciam hi.TopaTopa
Hih gamah kei ka si dinga, Jordan khengin ka pai thei kei ding hi. Ahih hangin note in kantanin tua gam hoih na luah ding uh hi.
Topana Pasian un note tawh hong bawl thuciamna mangngilhin,Topana Pasian un note’ hih dinga hong kham lim khat peuhpeuh tawh a kibang a kiseek milim na bawlkhak loh nadingun kidawm un.TopaTopa
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian uh hong kaangtum thei mei tawh kibang a, a haza Pasian ahi hi.Topa

“Note in tuleta nei-in gam sungah mi khangham na suah uh ciangin, na khat peuhpeuh tawh a kibang limin a kiseek milim bawlna leTopana Pasian uh’ muhna-ah a sia bawlna tawh amah a heh nadingin na siat gamtat uhleh,Topa

Jordan galkhat luah dingin na paina leitang uhah na siat mai mang baih nadingun note’ langkhat ah teci pang dingin tuni-in van le lei ka sam hi. Tua leitang tungah note sauvei na hing kei ding uh a, na sia maimang ding uh hi.
Topain mite lakah note hong thehthang dinga,Topain note hong hawlna minamte lakah mi tawmcik bek na omlai ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Note in tua lai munah mite’ khut in a bawl, khua mu thei lo, khua za thei lo, a ne thei lo, a nam thei lo sing le suang pasian-te’ na na sem ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua lai paninTopana Pasian uh na zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na zon uhleh amah na mu ding uh hi.Topa
Note in gimna thuakin, mailam hunah hih nate khempeuh note’ tungah hong tun ciangin,Topana Pasian uh lamah kihei-in ama thu na mang ding uh hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian uh hehpihna a nei Pasian ahi hi. Amah in note hong tamasak loin, hong nusia lo dinga, na pate uh tawh a thuciamna mangngilh lo ding hi.Topa

“Pasian in leitungah mi a piansak ni a kipan, note’ pian ma-a hun beisa thu tu-in kan unla, van mong khat pan mong khat kikal thu zong kan un. Hih bang na lian piang ngei-in, a kiza ngei peuhmah hiam?
Note in Pasian’ aw za khin napi-in na hin lai uh bangin meikuang sung panin pasian dang khat peuhpeuh’ pauna aw mi khat peuhpeuh in za ngei ahi hiam?

Tua ahih kei leh,Topana Pasian un Egypt gam sungah note adingin na muhna uhah a bawlte khempeuh tawh a kibangin, ze-etna, lim, nalamdang, gal, a vanglian le a thahatna le a lauhuai mahmah tawh pasian dang khat peuhpeuh in ama mite adingin minamdang khat sung pan minam khat a va lak ding hanciam ngam ngei ahi hiam?Topa
TopaPasian hi, ci-in na theih nadingun note’ tungah hih thu hong kilak hi a, amah sim loh kuamah dang om lo hi.Topa
Amah in note hong khal theih nadingin vantung panin ama aw note hong zasak hi. A mei lianpi leitungah note hong musak a, mei sung panin ama aw na za uh hi.
Amah in na pate uh itin, amau’ suanlekhakte hong teel a, a mahmah in ama vanglian tawh Egypt panin note hong pai khiatpih a,

note sangin a tam zaw le a vanglian zawte’ gamah hong paipihin, note’ luah dingin amau’ leitang hong piak nadingin note’ mai-ah amaute hong hawl khiatsak ahih manin tuni-in hih bangin na om thei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tunga om vantung hitaleh nuai-a om leitung hitalehTopapen Pasian ahihna thu tuni-in thei unla, na lungsim uhah ciamteh un; kuamah dang om lo hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin note le note’ khit a na tate uh tungah thu hong nuamin,Topana Pasian un a tawntung a hong piak gam sungah na khan uh na sausak theih nadingun tuni-a no kiangah kong gen ahi ama thukhamte le a thupiakte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ciangin, a beisa hunah amah tawh kilangneihna a om lo, tum lopi-in a veengpa a that, mi that khapa va tai-in, hih khuapite khat peuhpeuhah taina tawh a suahtak theih nadingin Moses in nisuahna lam Jordan galkhat ah khuapi thum a tuam koih hi.
Reuben mite adingin mualzang sehnel gam Beza khua, Gad mite adingin Gilead gam sung Ramoth khua le Manasseh mite adingin Bashan gam sung Golan khua ahi hi.
Moses in Israel mite tungah thu pia hi.

Hihte pen, Egypt gam panin a pai khiat-un Moses le Israel mite in a zawh Heshbon-ah a teeng Amor mite’ kumpipa Sihon’ gam sung, Jordan gal, Bethpeor tawh a kigalsai kuam sungah, Egypt panin Israel mite a pai khiat lai-in Moses in amaute tungah a gen thute ahi hi.

Amaute in, Arnon kuam mong a a om Aroer panin Sirion Mual (Hermon a cihna) dong, Jordan nisuahna lama om Arabah gam khempeuh, Pisgah mual pang nuai Arabah tuipi dong tawh, kumpi Sihon’ leitang le Bashan kumpi Og’ leitang, Jordan galkhat nisuahna lamah a teeng Amor kumpi nihte’ leitang a luah uh hi.
Moses in Israel-te khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Israel-te aw, tuni-a note’ zakin kong gen thukhamte le ngeina kipte ngai unla, note in thei-in limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
Topai Pasian in eite tawh Horeb-ah thuciamna khat bawl hi.Topa
Topain i pute i pate bek tawh hih thuciamna a bawl hi loin, tuni-a a hinglai eite khempeuh tawh zong a bawl ahi hi.Topa

Note’ tungahTopa’thu a gen dinginTopale note’ kikalah ka din laitakin, mei sung panin tua mualahTopain kimaituahin note hong hopih a, mei hangin note lau na hih manun mualtungah na paito kei uh hi. Amah in:Topa’TopaTopa
“‘Kei pen salsuahna Egypt leitang panin note a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“‘Keimah longal pasian dang na nei kei ding uh hi.
“‘A kiseek milim hitaleh, tunga vantung hitaleh, nuai-a leitung hitaleh, leinuai-a om tui sung hitaleh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note adingin na bawl kei ding uh hi.

Amaute’ mai-ah kun loin, amau’ na na sem kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimahTopanote’ Pasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah a pate’ mawhna a tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,Topa
ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite’ tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi.
“Topanote’ Pasian’ min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih lehTopain ama min a sia lamin a zang mi a mawh lo hi, ci lo ding hi.TopaTopa
“‘Topanote’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na sianthosak nadingun Sabbath ni tang un.Topa
Ni guk sung na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni penTopanote’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note bangin na nasem numei le na nasem pasalte uh a tawlngak theih nadingin note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasem nute, na nasempate, na bawngtal, na la, na ganhing khat peuhpeuh uh le na huang sung uha om zinte in na khat peuhpeuh sem lo ding uh hi.Topa

Egypt-ah nasem na hihna uh le tua lai paninTopana Pasian un a vangliatna khut le a thahatna tawh hong pai khiatpihna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Sabbath ni na tan ding uhTopanote’ Pasian in thu hong pia hi.TopaTopa
“‘Topanote’ Pasian in hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh sau-in na nopsak theih nadingunTopanote’ Pasian in hong thupiak bangin na nu na pa uh zahtak un.TopaTopa
“‘Mi na that kei ding uh hi.
“‘Nulepa mawhna zong na bawl kei ding uh hi.
“‘Na na gu kei ding uh hi.
“‘Na veengte uh langkhat ah zong a man loin teci na pang kei ding uh hi.
“‘Na veengte uh zi zong na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na veengte’ inn, a lo, a nasem pa, a nasem nu, a bawngtal, a la, ahih kei leh na veengte’ na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi.

“Topain mei, meii le a mial mahmah sung panin awging lianpi tawh mual tunga no a kikhawm khempeuh tungah hih thute hong gen a, amah in bangmah dang genthuah lo hi. Amah in suangpek nih tungah tuate gelhin, tua suangpeekte kei tungah hong pia hi.Topa
“Mei in mual a kat laitakin khuamial sung panin awging na zak uh ciangin minam lutang khempeuh le upate kei kiangah hong pai uh hi.
Note in, ‘En in,Topai Pasian in a minthanna le a liatna eite’ tungah hong lak khin a, mei sung panin ama awging i za khin hi. Pasian in mi hopih napi, mi a hinglai veve-in tuni-in i mu hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin tu-in eite si ding ihi hiam? Hih mei lianpi in eite hong kaangtum ding hi.Topai Pasian’ awging za lai lehang eite i si ding hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh a si thei mihing khempeuh sung panin eite’ zak bangin mei sung panin a nungta Pasian a paukhiatna awging za-in a nungta lai kua om ahi hiam?

A nai-ah va pai inla,Topai Pasian in a gen ding khempeuh va za in.Topai Pasian in nang tungah hong gen teng ko’ tungah nang hong gensawn in. Kote in hong mangin ka sem ding uh hi,’ nong ci uh hi.TopaTopa
“Kei kiangah nong gen uh cianginTopain na thu uh a za hi.Topain kei kiangah, ‘Hih mite in nang kiangah hong gen uh thu ka za khin a, a gen khempeuh uh a manin gen uh hi.TopaTopa
Amaute le a suan a khakte uh a nopsak tawntung theih nadingun keimah zahtak ding le ka thupiak khempeuh zuih ding hih bang ngaihsutna nei tawntung le-uh ka deih ahi hi.
Pai inla amaute kiangah, “Na puanbuk uhah ciah un,” ci in.

Ahih hangin nang, kei kiang hih lai-ah ding in. Amaute’ neih dingin ka piak leitangah amaute in a zuih theih nadingun amaute na hilh ding thupiakna le thukhamte le ngeina kipte khempeuh nang tungah kong gen ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua ahih cianginTopana Pasian un note hong thupiak bangin na gamtat ding uh na kingaihsun ding uh a, ama thu panin taklam hitaleh veilam hitaleh ah na pial kei ding uh hi.Topa
Note nungta-in, nuamsa-in na luah ding uh leitangah sawtpi na nuntak nadingunTopana Pasian un note hong thupiakna lampi khempeuh na tawn ding uh hi.Topa

“Tu-in, luah dinga na paina gam uhah na zuih dingun, note le na tapate uh le na suanlekhakte unTopanote’ Pasian’ thukhamte le a thupiakte na zuihna uh tawh amah na zahtak theih nadingun,Topana Pasian un na nuntak tawntung uh na zuih dingun kei a hong hilh sawnsak thute pen hih thupiakna, thukhamte le ngeina kipte ahi hi. Hihte pen na khan uh a sau theih nading ahi hi.TopaTopa

Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te aw, note nuamsa-in,Topa,na pate uh Pasian in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna gamah tampi pha-in na khan theih nadingun hih thute za unla, na zuih ding uh ngaihsun un.Topa,
“Israel-te aw, za un:Topai Pasian,Topakhat bek ahi hi.TopaTopa
Topanote’ Pasian, na lungsim khempeuh uh, na nuntakna khempeuh uh le na thahatna khempeuh uh tawh na it ding uh hi.Topa
Tuni-a no kong piak hih thute na lungsim uhah om ding hi.
Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na inn sung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh le na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uh hi.
Na khut tung uhah lim dingin tuate na hen ding uh a, na mitte uh kikalah tuate pen talsuante bang hi ding hi.
Na inn kongkhak khuam tung uh le na kongpi uh tungah tuate na gelh ding uh hi.
“Topana Pasian un note piak dingin na pate uh Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah a ciam, note’ phuh loh a lian a hoih khuapite,Topa
note’ khol loh na hoih khempeuh tawh a kidim innte, note’ bawl loh tuibeem, note’ suan loh leengguite le oliv kungte a omna leitangah hong paipihin, note in ne-in na kham uh ciangin,
salsuahna Egypt leitang panin hong pai khiatpihTopana mangngilh khak loh nading uh kidawm un.Topa
Topana Pasian uh na zahtak ding uh hi. Ama na bek na sem ding uh a, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uh hi.Topa
Note’ kiima om mite’ pasian-te ahi pasian dangte’ nung na zui kei ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh note’ lakah a omTopana Pasian uh a aam Pasian ahi hi. Tua bang hikeileh note’ tungahTopana Pasian uh hong hehin, lei maitang panin note hong susia ding hi.TopaTopa
“Massah munah amah na ze-et uh banginTopana Pasian uh na ze-et nawn kei ding uh hi.Topa
Amah in note hong thupiaksa ahiTopana Pasian un hong thupiakte khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.Topa

Topa’hong ciamsa bangin note’ mai panin na langte khempeuh uh nawhkhiatna tawh na pu na pate uh tungah piak dinginTopain a ciamsa leitang hoih note in na luah theih nading uh le note na nopsak theih nadingunTopa’muhna-ah a man le a hoih nate na sem ding uh hi.Topa’TopaTopa’
“Hong tung ding hunah na tapate un, ‘Topai Pasian in note hong piak hih thute, bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot uh cianginTopa
na tapate uh kiangah, ‘Eite pen Egypt gam sungah Faro’ silate ihi a,Topain Egypt panin a vangliatna tawh hong pai khiatpih hi.Topa
Topain eite’ muhna-ah a lian a nasia lim le na lamdangte Egypt mite le Faro le a uliante khempeuh tungah lak hi.Topa
Amah in i pu i pate tungah piak dinga a ciam leitangah hong paipihin, eite hong piak theih nadingin tua lai panin eite hong pai khiatpih hi.
Tuhun a bangin i nuntak theih nadingin amah in eite’ hoih tawntung ding a deihna-in,Topai Pasian zahtakin hih thukhamte khempeuh i zuih dingTopain thu hong pia hi.TopaTopa
Amah in eite hong thupiak banginTopai Pasian’ mai-ah hih thupiakte khempeuh limtakin zui lehang eite adingin thumanna hi ding hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.Topa

“Topana Pasian un luah dinga na tumna uh leitangah hong paipihin, note’ mai-ah Hit mite, Girgash mite, Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite, note sangin lian zaw-in a thahat zaw minam sagihte note’ mai panin siang khiasakin,Topa

Topana Pasian un note tungah amaute hong pia-in, note in amaute na zawh uh ciangin, note in amaute na susia mang ding uh hi. Amaute tawh thuciamna na bawl kei ding uh a, amaute tungah hehpihna na lak kei ding uh hi.Topa
Amaute tawh kiteeng loin, na tanute uh amau’ tapate pia loin, a tanute uh na tapate uh adingin na la kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh pasian dangte’ na a sem dinginTopazuihna panin na tapate uh amaute in hei khia ding uh hi. Tua ciangin no tungahTopahong hehin note hong susia pak ding hi.TopaTopa
Amaute tungah hih bangin note na gamta ding uh hi: A biakna taute uh phelsakin, a biakna songte uh dengzanin, amau’ Asherah milimte phuksakin, a kiseek a milimte uh mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh note penTopanote’ Pasian’ tungah a siangtho mi na hi uh hi. Leitung a om mite khempeuh sung panin ama mi ahi dinginTopana Pasian un note hong teel zo hi.TopaTopa
“Topain note hong itin hong teelna pen midangte sangin na tamzawkna hang uh hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh lakah a tawm pen na hi uh hi.Topa

Topain salsuahna Egypt kumpipa Faro’ khut sung panin note hong hon khia-in a vangliatna tawh hong pai khiatpihna penTopain note hong itin, na pate uh tunga a kiciam thuciam a zuihna hang ahi hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih cianginTopana Pasian uh amah bek ahi Pasian hi a, amah itin a thupiakna a zuite tungah khang tulkhat dongin thuciamna le itna kip lenin a thuman Pasian,Topa
amah a mudah mite, suksiatna tawh a thukpah pa ahihna thei un. Amah a mudah mi tungah zekai loin a maitang mahah thuk ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni-a no kong piak thute khempeuh limtakin na zuih ding uh ngaihsun un.
“Note in hih ngeina kipte za-in, kemin tuate na zuihna hangun,Topana Pasian un na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam thuciamna le itna kip note tungah hong tungsak ding hi.Topa

Amah in note hong itin, tampi hong phasak ding hi. Amah in note tungah piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah a ciam gam sungah note’ suanlekhakte le na gam sung panun a piangte, na an uh le na leenggahzu uh le na sathau uh le na ganhingte uh pungsakin, na tuulekeelno honte uh zong thupha pia ding hi.
Midangte khempeuh sangin note thupha hong kilim piak zaw ding hi. Note’ lak hitaleh na ganhingte uh lak hitaleh ah a nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a ciing om lo ding hi.

Topain note’ tung panin natna khempeuh la khia ding hi. Note in na theihsa uh ahi Egypt gam a natna siate note’ tungah khat zong hong tung lo dinga, ahih hangin no hong mudahte khempeuh tungah tuate tungsak ding hi.Topa
Topana Pasian un note tungah hong piak mi khempeuh na beisak ding uh a, amaute na khasiat kei ding uh hi. Note adingin thangzak hi ding ahih manin amau’ pasian-te zong na bia kei ding uh hi.Topa
“Na lungsim uhah, ‘Hih minamte ei sangin tam zaw hi. Amaute bangci suankhiat zawh ding ihi hiam?’ na cih khak uhleh,
amaute na kihta kei ding uh hi.Topana Pasian un Faro le Egypt mite khempeuh tungah a hih,Topa

na mitte un a muhsa a lian ze-etnate, limte, na lamdangte, a vangliatna leTopana Pasian un hong pai khiatpihna a thahatna na phawk ding uh hi.Topana Pasian un na kihtak uh mi khempeuh tungah tua bangin hih ding hi.TopaTopa
Tua tham loin, a omlai mite le no kiang panin a bu mite a siat khit dong matenginTopana Pasian un amaute’ lakah tunpi khah ding hi.Topa
Note in amaute na kihta kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a lian a kihtakhuai ahi Pasian,Topana Pasian uh note tawh a om hi.Topa
Topana Pasian un note’ mai-ah hih minamte tawm tawmin siang khiasak ding hi. Note adingin gamsate hong tam khanlua kha ding ahih manin thakhatthu-in amaute na beisak kei ding uh hi.Topa
Ahih hanginTopana Pasian un note tungah amaute hong pia dinga, amaute a bei matengin kibuaisak ding hi.Topa

Amah in note’ khut sungah amaute’ kumpite hong pia dinga, note in mun khempeuh panin amaute’ min na maimangsak ding uh hi. Amaute na susia mang khin ding uh a, note’ langkhat ah mi khat beek hong pang zo lo ding hi.

A kiseek amau’ pasian milimte mei tawh na hal ding uh hi. Tua nate-ah na awk khak loh nadingun amaute’ tunga a om kham le ngun deihgawh loin, note adingin na la kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua penTopana Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.Topa

Note’ inn sungah a kihhuai nate na tumpih kei ding uh a, tua nate tawh kibangin samsiat a thuak mi na kisuaksak kei ding uh hi. Note in tua nate mudah mahmahin na kih ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nate a kisamsia na ahi hi.

“Note nungta-in tampi na phak theih nading uh le na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingaTopaa kiciamsa leitangah va pai-in na neih theih nadingun tuni-a note kiangah kong gen thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi.Topa

A thupiakte na zui uh hiam, na zui kei uh hiam cih a theih nadingin note hong niamkhiatin, na lungsim uhah bang om hiam cih a theih nadinginTopana Pasian un sehnel gamah hih kum sawmli sung note hong paipihna lampi khempeuh na ciamteh ding uh hi.Topa

Mite, an bek tawh nungta loinTopa’kamsung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsak nadingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkialsak a, note hitaleh na pu na pate uh hitaleh a theih ngei loh manna tawh hong vak hi.Topa’
Hih kum sawmli sung note’ tunga om na puan uh sia loin, na khe uh zong bawk lo hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khat in a tapa a khal banginTopana Pasian un note hong khalna thu na lungsim uhah thei un.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin ama lampi zuihna le amah zahtakna tawhTopanote Pasian’ thupiakte na zui ding uh hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopanote’ Pasian in, mual le guamah a luang tuite a omna, ciktui le tuikhuk a omna leitang,Topa
mangbuh le mangbuhham, leenggui le theikung le mang kawlsing a omna leitang, oliv kungte le khuaizu a omna leitang,
bangmah kisam loin, cilbawl loin an na nek nading uh leitang, a suangte sik ahihna leitang, mualte sung panin sumsan na tawh theihna uh leitang ahi gam hoihah note hong paipih hi.
Note in ne-in na gil uh vah dinga, note tungah gam hoih hong piakna hanginTopana Pasian uh na phat ding uh hi.Topa
“Tuni-a no tungah kong gen ahi ama thupiaknate le a ngeina kipte le a thukhamte zuih lohna tawhTopana Pasian uh mangngilh kha ding na hih manun kidawm un.Topa
Tua hikeileh, an ne-in na kham uh ciang, inn hoihte lamin tuate sungah na ten uh ciang,
na bawnghonte uh le na tuuhonte uh tampi a phak ciang le na khamte uh le na ngunte uh tampi pha-in, na neih khempeuh uh tampi a phak ciangin
na lungsim uh lianin, salsuahna Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih,
a lian a lauhuai sehnel gamah gul gunei le momai lak le tui om lohna lei keu-ah a hong paipihpa, meisuang tawh a kibang suangpi panin tui a hong piapa,

a tawpna-ah a hoihin na gamtat theih nading uh a deihna-in note hong niamkhiatin a hong ze-et theih nadingin na pu na pate un a theih loh manna tawh sehnel gamah a hong vakTopana Pasian uh na mangngilh kha ding uh hi.Topa
Na lungsim uhah, ‘Ka vangliatna uh le ka thahatna un hih hauhna hong ngahsak hi,’ ci kha ding na hih manun kingaihsun un.
Tuni-a mah bangin na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciamna a kipsak theih nadingin, na hauh nadingun vangliatna a hong piapa amah ahih maninTopana Pasian uh na phawk ding uh hi.Topa
Topana Pasian uh mangngilhin pasian dangte’ nung zui-in tuate’ na semin na biak uhleh, na sia taktak ding uh hi, ci-in tuni-in limtakin kong hilh khol hi.Topa
Topanote’ Pasian’ aw ngai lo ahih manun,Topain note’ mai-ah a siatsak minamte bangin note na sia ding uh hi.TopaTopa

“Israel-te aw, za un; note sangin tam zaw-in a thahat zaw minamte, lianin van banin kulhpi a kiciangto khuapite, na theihsa uh mi ahi a pum lian a tun sang Anak mite, ‘Anak mite, kua in do zo ding ahi hiam?’ a kicih na zak ngei mite uh a suan khia dingin Jordan a kantan ta ding na hi uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, a kaangtum thei mei bangin note’ mai-ah a pai pa penTopana Pasian uh ahihna thu tuni-in thei un. Amah in note’ mai-ah amaute susia-in, amaute zo gawp ding hi. Tua ahih cianginTopain note tungah hong ciamsa bangin amaute hawl khia-in manlangin na siasak mang ding uh hi.TopaTopa

“Topana Pasian un note mai panin amaute a nawhkhiat khit ciangin, na lungsim uhah, ‘Hih leitang a luah dinginTopain hong paipihna pen komau’ thumanna hang ahi hi,’ ci kha kei un.Topain na mai uhah amaute a hawl khiatna pen hih minamte’ gitlohna hang hi zaw hi.TopaTopaTopa

Na thumanna hang uh ahi a, na lungsim manna hang uh tawh ahi zongin amau’ leitang a luah ding na hi kei uh hi.Topana Pasian un na mai panun amaute a hawl khiatna pen hih minamte’ gitlohna hang leTopain na pu na pate uh Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah a thuciamna kammal a kipsak theih nading ahi hi.TopaTopa
“Tua ahih ciangin note’ thumanna hanginTopana Pasian un na tan dingun hih leitang hoih note tungah hong pia ahih lohna thei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note pen lungsim khauh mi na hi uh hi.Topa
“Topana Pasian uh sehnel gamah phinin na hehsakna uh phawk unla, mangngilh kei un. Egypt gam panin na pai khiat ni uh a kipan hih lai na tun dongunTopalangpanin na lehdo uh hi.TopaTopa
Horeb mual nangawnah a heh nadinginTopana phin uh a, note’ tungahTopaheh a, amah in note hong susia dektak hi.TopaTopa
Topain note tawh a bawl thuciamna suangpeekte a sang dingin mualtungah ka paitoh lai-in, mualtungah sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung ka om a, an ne lo, tui dawn loin ka om hi.Topa
Pasian’ khut tawh a kigelh suangpek nihte kei tungahTopain hong pia hi. Kikhop ni-in mei sung panin note tungahTopain hong gensa kammal khempeuh tua suangpeekte tungah om hi.TopaTopa
Sun sawmli le zan sawmli a cin ni-in kiciamna suangpek nihteTopain kei hong pia hi.Topa

“Tua cianginTopain kei kiangah, ‘Kithawi inla, hih lai panin paisuk mengmeng in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin na pai khiatpih mite a sia-in gamta khin uh hi. Amaute ka thupiakna panin kihei khia pak uh a, amaute adingin a kisung milim khat bawl khin uh hi,’ hong ci hi.Topa
“Tua tham loinTopain kei kiangah, ‘Hih mite ka mu khin a, a lungsim khauh mite ahi hi.Topa
Amaute susia-in mun khempeuh panin amaute’ min ka phiat theih nadingin kei guak hong omsak in. Amaute sangin a vanglian zaw, a tam zaw minamin nang kong bawl ding hi,’ hong ci lai hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin kihei-in mual tung panin kong paisuk a, mei in mual kaangin na kuang hi. Kiciamna suangpek nihte ka khut nihte sungah om hi.
Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh,Topana Pasian tung uhah na khial khin takpi uh a, a kisung bawngno milim amaute adingin na bawl uh hi.Topain note hong thupiakna panin na kihei khia pak uh hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin suangpek nihte la-in ka khut nihte’ sung panin lawnin note’ muhna-ah ka sukham hi.

Tua ciangin a masa-a bangin sun sawmli le zan sawmli sungTopa’mai-ah kunin ka om a, ama heh nadingin phinin,Topa’muhna-ah a sia gamtatna tawh note’ khialhnate khempeuh hangin an ne lo, tui dawn loin ka om hi.Topa’Topa’
Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ tungahTopa’hehna le a lungkim het lohna, note susia dingin a kithawina hangin ka lau hi. Ahih hangin tua hunin zongTopain kei’ thu hong ngai hi.Topa’Topa
Aaron’ tungahTopaheh mahmah a, amah susia dingin kithawi a, tua hun mahin Aaron ading zong thu ka ngen hi.Topa
Tua ciangin note’ khialhna, na bawlsa uh bawngno, mei tawh halin sukhamin, leivui bangin a neel dongin ka gawizan hi. Tua ciangin mual tung panin a hong luangsuk lui sungah a vuite ka lawn hi.
“Taberah, Massah le Kibrothhattaavah munte-ah zongTopaphinin na hehsak uh hi.Topa
Topain Kadeshbarnea panin note hong sawlin, ‘Paito unla note kong piak leitang luah un,’ hong cih lai-inTopana Pasian uh hong thupiakna nialin, amah um loin, ama aw na ngai kei uh hi.TopaTopa
Note kong theih ni a kipanTopana nial uh hi.Topa
“Tua ahih cianginTopain note ka susia ding ci ahih manin hih sun sawmli le zan sawmli sungTopa’mai-ah kunin ka om hi.TopaTopa’
Topa’tungah thu ka ngen a, ‘TopaPasianaw, nangmah in na liatna tawh na hotkhiatsa, na vangliatna tawh Egypt panin na pai khiatpih na mite le na luahte susia kei in.Topa’Pasian
Na nasem Abraham, Isaac le Jakob phawk inla, hih mihingte’ lungsim khauhna hitaleh a gitlohna uh hitaleh a khialhna uh hitaleh thusim kei in.

Tua bang hikeileh kote nong pai khiatpihna gam mite in, “Topain amaute tungah a ciamsa leitangah amaute paipih zo loin, amah in amaute mudah ahih manin, sehnel gamah amaute a that dingin pai khiatpih hi,” ci kha ding uh hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen na vangliatna le na thahatna tawh na pai khiatpih na mihingte le na luahte ahi hi,’ ka ci hi.
“Tua hun laitakinTopain kei kiangah, ‘A masa-a bangin suangpek nih seekin, mual tung ka kiangah hong pai inla, sing singkuang khat bawl in.Topa
A masa-a suangpek na sukkhapte’ tunga thute tua suangpeekte tungah ka gelh dinga, singkuang sungah tuate na koih ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin singkha sing tawh singkuang khat bawlin, a masa-a bangin suangpek nih ka seek a, ka khut sungah a peek nihte tawi-in mualtungah ka paito hi.

Kikhop ni-in mei sung panin mualtungahTopain note tungah hong gensa thupiak sawmte, a masa-a a kigelh bangin tua suangpeekte tungah amah in gelh a, tua cianginTopain kei tungah tua suangpeekte hong pia hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin kihei-in mual tung panin ka paisuk a, ka bawlsa singkuang sungah tua suangpeekte ka koih hi.Topain kei hong thupiak bangin suangpeekte tua sungah a om hi.Topa
(Beeroth Benejaakan panin Moserah-ah Israel mite zin uh hi. Tua lai-ah Aaron si a, tua lai munah kivui hi. Ama tangin a tapa Eleazar in siampi na sem hi.
Tua lai panin Gudgodah-ah pai uh a, Gudgodah panin lui tuite a omna gam Jotbathah-ah pai uh hi.
Tua hun laitakinTopain, tuni dongin ama na a sem ding le ama min tawh thupha a pia dinginTopa’mai-ah dingin,Topa’thuciamna singkuang a pua dingin Levi minamte a tuam koih hi.TopaTopa’Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin a sanggamte uh bangin Levi mite in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo uh a,Topana Pasian un amau kiangah a gen banginTopapen amau’ luah ahi hi.)TopaTopa
“A masa-a bangin sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung mualtungah ka om a,Topain tua hunin zong ka thu hong ngai a,Topain note hong susia nawn lo hi.TopaTopa
Topain kei kiangah, ‘Amaute tungah piak dingin a pu a pate uh tungah ka kiciam leitangah pai-in a luah theih nadingun ding inla, na khualzin uh zomin mite mai-ah pai in,’ hong ci hi.Topa
“Israel-te aw, tu-in,Topana Pasian uh zahtak ding, ama lampite tot ding, amah it ding, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawhTopanote’ Pasian’ na sep ding,TopaTopa
le nomau’ hoih nadingin tuni-a kong gen thupiaknate leTopa’thukhamte zuih ding cih sim loh,Topana Pasian un note’ tung panin bang dang hong kal ahi hiam?Topa’Topa
En un, vantung le vantung a sang pente le leitung le a sunga om khempeuh penTopanote’ Pasian-a’ ahi hi.Topa
Tua hi napi-inTopain na pu na pate uh a itna lian mahmah ahih manin tuni-a mah bangin midangte khempeuh sangin amau’ suanlekhakte hong teel zaw hi.Topa
Tua ahih cianginTopa’thu mang unla, lungkhauh nawn kei un.Topa’
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian uh a lian, a vanglian, a kihtakhuai Pasian, angvan nei loin, sumgolh a la lo, pasian-te’ Pasian, topate’ Topa ahi hi.Topa
Amah in pa nei lote le meigong numeite adingin thutang semin, peemtate itin an le puan a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin peemtate it un; bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt gamah peemta na hi uh hi.
Topanote’ Pasian na zahtak ding uh a, ama na semin, amah beelin, ama min tawh na kiciam ding uh hi.Topa
Amah pen nomau’ phat ding ahi hi. Na mitte un a muhsa hih a lian a kihtakhuai nate note adingin hong bawlsak pa pen na Pasian uh ahi hi.
Na pu na pate uh mihing sawmsagih bek Egypt-ah paisuk uh a, ahi zongin tu-inTopana Pasian un vantung aksi zahin note hong tamsak hi.Topa
“Tua ahih cianginTopana Pasian uh itin ama hong thuhilhna, a thukhamte, a ngeina kipte, a thupiakte na zui tawntung ding uh hi.Topa
Tuni-in ngaihsun un (a thei nai lo, a mu nai lo na tate uh tungah a gen hi lo ka hih ciangin),Topanote’ Pasian’ hong thuhilhna, ama liatna, a vangliatna le a thahatna,Topa
Egypt kumpipa Faro le a leitang tung khempeuh ah a hih Egypt gam sunga ama limte le a sepnate;
Egypt galkapte, a sakolte le a leengte tungah a hihte; note hong delh laitakin San Tuipi tawh amaute tuumsakin, tuni donginTopain amaute a suksiatna;Topa
hih mun na tun matengun sehnel gamah amah in note tungah hong hihte;
Reuben’ tapa Eliab, a tapa Dathan le Abiram tungah a hihte; leitang a kam ka-in Israel khempeuh lakah a innkuanpihte, a puanbukte le amau a zuite khempeuh tawh amaute a nawmvalhna ngaihsun un.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’hihsa a nasepna a liante khempeuh na mitte un mu khin hi.Topa’

“Tua ahih ciangin note thahatin, na luah ding uh leitangah va pai-in na luah theih nading uh le,Topain na pu na pate uh le a suanlekhakte uh tungah piak dingin a kiciam, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gamah sauvei na nuntak theih nadingun tuni-a kong gen thupiakna khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh luah dinga na lut nading uh leitang pen note’ hong pai khiatna, anteh cinna huan banga khaici vawhin tui na buah nadingun nakpitakin na semin tui na lakna uh Egypt leitang tawh kibang lo hi.
Note va pai-in na luah ding uh leitang pen, vantung panin guahtui a ngah mual le guam a omna leitang,
Topana Pasian un a kep leitang hi a, kum kipat a kipan kum bei donginTopanote’ Pasian in tua leitang en tawntung hi.TopaTopa
“Topana Pasian uh itin, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep nadingun tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate na zuih uhleh,Topa
na an uh le na leenggahzu uh le na sathau uh na kaihkhop theih nadingun amah in guah masa le guah nunung, a hunin na leitang uh adingin hong zusak ding hi.
Amah in na ganhingte uh adingin na gam sung uhah lopa hong posak dinga, note in zong an ne-in na gil uh vah ding hi.
Midangte’ hong khemna hangin note kihei-in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biakkhak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.

Tua hikeileh no tungahTopahong hehin guah zu lo dinga, leitang in bangmah piangsak loin,Topain no hong piak leitang hoihah manlangin na siat pak theih nadingun amah in vantungte khakcip kha ding hi.TopaTopa
“Tua ahih ciangin hih ka thugente na lungsim uhah ciamtehin na ngaihsun ding uh hi. Na khut tung uhah lim dingin na khih ding uh a, tuate pen na mitte uh kikalah talsuan hi ding hi.
Na tate uh tungah na hilh ding uh a, na inn sung uhah na lut laitak, lampi-ah na pai laitak, na lup ciang uh leh na thawh ciangun tuate genin na nei ding uh hi.

Vantungte, leitung’ tungah a om laiteng, amaute tungah piak dinginTopain na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciam gam sungah note le na tate uh khan a sau theih nadingin na inn kongkhak khuam uh le na kongpite uh tungah tuate na gelh ding uh hi.Topa
“Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian uh itin, ama lampi khempeuh zui-in, amah beelin, nomau zuih dingin kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh zuih ding na kingaihsut uhleh,Topa
Topain na mai uhah a om hih minamte khempeuh hawl khia dinga, note sangin lian zaw-in a thahat zaw minamte na suan khia ding uh hi.Topa
Na khe un a sikna mun khempeuh nomau a’ hi ding hi. Na gamgi uh sehnel gam panin Lebanon ciang dong le Eufratis gun panin nitumna tuipi dong hi ding hi.
Na lang uhah kuamah pang zo lo ding hi. No tungah hong ciam banginTopana Pasian un na tot ding uh gam khempeuh tungah note hong kizahtakna le note hong kikihtakna tungsak ding hi.Topa
“En un, tuni-in na mai uhah thupha khat le hamsiat khat ka koih hi.
Tuni-a kong gen,Topana Pasian uh thupiaknate na zuih uhleh thupha hi a,Topa
Topana Pasian uh thupiaknate mang loin, na theih nai loh uh pasian dangte’ nungzui dingin tuni-a no kong thupiakna panin na kiheikhiat uh le hamsia ahi hi.Topa
Luah dingin na lutna uh leitangahTopana Pasian un hong paipih ciangin Gerizim Mual tungah thupha taangko-in, Ebal Mual tungah hamsia na taangko ding uh hi.Topa
(Tua mualte, Jordan gal, lampi panin nitumna lam, Moreh tawsaw gei-a Gilgal galkhat, Arabah-ah a teeng Kanaan mite’ gam sungah om hi.)
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un note hong piak leitang a luah dingin Jordan kantanin a pai ding na hi uh hi. Tua leitang luahin a sungah na ten uh ciangin,Topa
tuni-a note kong piak thukhamte le ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih ding uh limtakin na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
“Hihte pen, leitungah na nuntak laiteng uhTopa,na pu na pate uh Pasian in na neih dingun no hong piaksa gam sungah limtakin na zuih ding uh thukhamte le ngeina kipte ahi hi.Topa,
Na suankhiat ding uh minamte in a biakna mun mual sangte tung le mual neute tung le singniim nuai, mun khempeuh na susia taktak ding uh hi.

Amaute’ biakna taute phel khia-in, a biakna songte dengzanin, amaute’ Asherah milimte mei tawh na hal ding uh hi. A kiseek amau’ pasian-te’ limte na phukpai ding uh a, tua mun panin amau’ min na maimangsak ding uh hi.
“Ahih hanginTopana Pasian uh tungah tua bangin na hih kei ding uh hi.Topa
Topana Pasian un na minam khempeuh uh sung panin ama min koih nadingin teelin, ama omna dinga a bawlna mun na zong ding uh hi.Topa

Tua lai-ah na pai ding uh a, na meihal biaknate uh le na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawm-ah-khat le na piak thuahte uh, thuciamna biakpiakna, utthu-a na piakna, na bawnghon tacilte uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh tua lai-ah na paipih ding uh hi.
Topana Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a,Topana Pasian un note thupha hong piakna hangin na hihna khempeuh uhah note le na innkuanpihte na lungdam ding uh hi.TopaTopa
“Tua hun ciangin mi khempeuh in ama hoihsak bangin a gamtat ngei ciat bangin na gamta nawn kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un note hong piak tawlngakna le luahna-ah na tung nai kei uh hi.Topa

Ahih hangin Jordan galkhat ah pai-in,Topana Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitangah teengin, nuamtakin na nuntak theih nadingun na kiim uha na langte khempeuh uh kiang panin tawlngakna hong piak ciangin,Topa

Topana Pasian un ama min om nading munin a teelna munah note kong sawl khempeuh na paipih ding uh hi. Na meihal biaknate uh le na biakpiaknate uh, note in na piak uh sawm-ah-khat le na piak thuahte uh leTopa’tungah na ciam uh na thuciam piaknate uh na paipih ding uh hi.TopaTopa’

Topana Pasian uh mai-ah note le na tapate uh le na tanute uh, na nasem numeite uh le na nasem pasalte uh le note’ neih bangin tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin a nei lo na khua sung uha om Levi mite tawh lungdam khawm un.Topa
Na tuahna mun peuh uhah na meihal biaknate uh na piak loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
Na minamte uh sung paninTopain a teelna mun khatah na meihal biaknate uh pia-in, note kong thupiakte khempeuh tua lai munah na hih ding uh hi.Topa

“Ahi zongin,Topana Pasian un note tungah hong piak thupha tawh kizui-in na khuapite uh khat peuhpeuh sungah sa na deih zahzah uh go-in na ne thei ding uh hi. Sanang le sakhitalte a kinek mah bangin mi a nin le a siang kideidan loin na ne thei ding uh hi.Topa
A si na ne kei bek ding uh hi; tui bangin leitungah a si na bua ding uh hi.

Na an uh sawm-ah-khat ahi a, na leenggahzu uh ahi a, na sathau uh ahi zongin, na bawnghon uh le na tuuhonte uh sung pan tacilte ahi zongin, na kiciamna uh ahi na thuciam uh biakpiakna khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, utthu-a na piakte uh ahi zongin, nomau’ piak thuahte ahi zongin na khuapite uh sungah na ne thei kei ding uh hi.

Topana Pasian un a teelna munah note le na tapate le na tanute, na nasem numeite le na nasem pasalte le na khuapite uh sunga om Levi mite inTopana Pasian uh mai-ah na ne ding uh hi. Na hihna khempeuh uhahTopana Pasian uh mai-ah na lungdam ding uh hi.TopaTopaTopa
Na gam sung uhah na ten laiteng uh Levi mite na mangngilh loh nadingun kingaihsun un.
“No tungah hong ciamsa banginTopana Pasian un na gamgi uh hong sotsak ciangin, sa na duh manun, ‘Sa ka ne ding uh hi,’ na cih uhleh, na duh zahzah uh sa na ne thei ding uh hi.Topa

Topana Pasian un ama min koih nadingin a teelna mun pen note kiang panin a gamla lua ahihleh, note kong thupiaksa banginTopain no hong piaksa na bawnghon uh pan ahi a, na tuuhon uh pan ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh na go thei ding uh a, na duh zahzah uh na khua sung uhah na ne thei ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Sanang ahi a, sakhi tal ahi zongin a kinek mah bangin na ne thei ding uh a, mi a nin le a siang kideidan loin a kibangin na ne thei ding uh hi.
A si na nek loh ding uh theitel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh si pen nuntakna hi a, nuntakna pen sa tawh na ne khawm kei ding uh hi.
Si na ne kei ding uh a, tui bangin leitungah na bua khia ding uh hi.
Topa’muhna-ah a manin na gamtat uh ciangin note le note’ khit cianga na tate uh a nopsak theih nadingin si na ne kei ding uh hi.Topa’
Ahih hangin na bat uh a siangtho nate le na thuciamna uh na piaknate uh note in la-inTopain a teelna munah na paipih ding uh a,Topa

Topana Pasian uh biakna tau tungah na meihal biakna uh, a sa le a si na pia ding uh hi. Na biakpiakna uh siteTopanote’ Pasian’ biakna tau tungah kibua khia dinga, ahih hangin a sa na ne thei ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Topana Pasian uh muhna-ah a hoih le a manin na gamtat uh ciangin note le note’ khit cianga na tate uh a nopsak theih nadingin note kong thupiak khempeuh na kin ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un.Topa
“Topana Pasian un na mai panun na suankhiat ding uh minamte beimangsakin, amaute suankhia-in amau’ leitangah na ten uh ciangin,Topa

na mai uhah amaute a kisuksiat khit ciangin amaute zui-in na awk khak loh nading uh le, ‘Kei zong amau’ hih bangin ka hih theih nadingin hih minamte in a pasian-te uh bangci biak ahi uh hiam?’ ci-in a pasian-te uh thu na kan loh nadingun kingaihsun un.

Topana Pasian uh tungah tua bangin na hih kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain a muhdah a kihhuai nam khempeuh amaute in a pasian-te uh adingin hih uh hi. A pasian-te uh adingin a tapate uh le a tanute nangawn uh mei sungah a hal uh hi.TopaTopa
“Note kong thupiak khempeuh na hih ding uh na lim ngaihsut ding uh hi. Na behlap kei ding uh a, zong na khiam kei ding uh hi.
“Note lakah kamsang khat ahi a, mangman khat ahi zongin hong khangin, lim ahi a, nalamdang ahi zongin hong lak a,
ama hong gen lim ahi a, nalamdang ahi zongin hong tungin, na theih ngei loh uh, ‘Adang pasian-te’ nung zui-in amaute va bia ni,’ hong cih leh,

tua kamsangpa’ thu ahi a, mangman pa’ thu ahi zongin na ngai kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopanote’ Pasian na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na it uh hiam cih a kitheih nadinginTopana Pasian un no hong ze-etna ahi hi.TopaTopa
Topana Pasian uh nung zui-in, amah na zahtak ding uh a, a thupiaknate zui-in a thu na ngai ding uh a, amah bia-in amah na beel ding uh hi.Topa

Ahih hangin tua kamsangpa ahi a, mangman pa ahi zongin kithat ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un na pai nadingun a hong thupiak na nusiat theih nading uh le Egypt leitang panin hong pai khiatpihin salsuahna panin hong hon khiaTopana Pasian uh langpangin na lehdo nading uh thu hong hilh ahi hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siang khiasak ding uh hi.TopaTopa

“Na sanggampa ahi a, na tanu ahih kei leh na tapa in ahi a, na ang sunga om na zi ahi a, nangmah banga na ngaihsut na lawm it in ahi zongin nang hong zol simin, leimong khat pan mong khat dong kikalah, nang kiang pan a nai ahi a, a gamla ahi zongin, nang hitaleh na pu na pate hitaleh in a theih ngei loh, na kiima om mite’ pasian-te, ‘Va pai-in pasian dangte va bia ni,’ hong cih leh
ama cih mang loin, a thu ngai loin, amah hehpih loin, amah khahkhong loin, amah na im kei ding hi.
Nangmah in amah na that ding hi. Amah a that dingin nangmah a masa pen na hi dinga, tua khit ciangin midangte khempeuh in hong zui ding uh hi.
Salsuahna ahi Egypt gam panin a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh kiang panin note hong pai khiatpih ding ngaihsun ahih manin suang tawh amah na denglum ding uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Israel-te khempeuh in za-in lau ding uh a, hih banga gitlohna note lakah bawlkik ngei nawn lo ding uh hi.
“Topana Pasian un tenna dinga hong piak na khuapite uh khat peuhpeuh sungah,Topa
mi ginalo pawlkhat note lakah hong pai-in, ‘Pai-in pasian dangte va bia ni,’ ci-in na theih ngei lohte uh lamah khuapi sunga teeng mite a pai khiatpihna na zak uhleh,
note in a thu na kan ding uh a, zongin limtakin na dong ding uh hi. Note lakah tua banga a kihhuai-in gamtatna thu a om mah ahih takpi leh,
tua khua sunga mite namsau tawh na that ding uh a, khua sunga om mi khempeuh le a ganhingte, namsau tawh na susia mang ding uh hi.

Note in van kinusiate khempeuh khua laizang mun awngah khawmin,Topana Pasian uh tungah khuapi le van kinusia khempeuh meihal biakna bupin mei tawh na hal ding uh hi. Tua khuapi pen ninkikholna hi tawntung dinga, kilamkik nawn lo ding hi.Topa

Tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate khempeuh zui-inTopana Pasian uh mai-ah a manin gamtatna tawhTopana Pasian uh’ aw na ngaih uhleh, na pu na pate uh tungah a ciamsa bangin, a kihtakhuai ama hehna paninTopakihei-in note tungah migitna hong lakin, note tungah hehpihna hong nei-in, note tampi tak hong phaksak theih nadingin a ki-apsa na khat beek zong note adingin na kem kei ding uh hi.TopaTopaTopa
“Note penTopana Pasian uh mite na hi uh hi. Misite hangin note ki-atkeh loin, na sam uh zong na mettol kei ding uh hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh note penTopana Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mite na hi uh a, leitunga om mite khempeuh sung panin ama neih dinginTopain note hong teel ahi hi.TopaTopa
“A kihhuai na khat peuhpeuh na ne kei ding uh hi.
Na nek theih ding uh ganhingte: Bawng, tuu, keel,
sakhi tal, sanang, sim sakhi, sathak, saza, zo sakhi le gamtuu ahi hi.
Ganhingte lak panin a khecin a ka, eknel a hai ganhing peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin eknel a hai a, a khecin a ka ahi zongin na nek theih loh dingte uh: Kalaoh, bilpi le sakikhte in eknel a hai hangin a khecin ka lo ahih manin note adingin a nin ahi hi.
Vok pen a khecin a kat hangin eknel hai lo ahih manin note-a’ dingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate’ sa ne loin, a sisate zong na lawng kei ding uh hi.
“Tui sunga om khempeuh lak panin phe le lip a nei peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Phe le lip a nei lo peuhmah na ne kei ding uh a, tuate pen no-a’ dingin a nin ahi hi.
“Vasa a siang khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin na nek loh dingte uh: Muvanlai, musane, luimu,
mupi, mumeika, amau nam ciat;
va-ak nam khempeuh;
vasa-kalaoh, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh;
keising le simbu, gam vatawt
le tui vatawt, samuat ne musane le tuimu,
gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh; huihtun le bak ahi hi.
“Kha a nei insek ganhing khempeuh no adingin a nin ahi hi; tuate kine lo ding hi.
A leng thei insek ganhing a siangte khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi.

“Ama thu-a a si tawm ganhing peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi. A nek dingun na khua sung uha om khualmite tungah na pia thei ding uh a, tua ahih kei leh zong gamdang mite tungah na zuak thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note penTopana Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mi na hi uh hi.Topa“Keelno a pi’ nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uh hi.
“A kum kumin na lo uhah a piang, na khaici panun a piang khempeuh sawm-ah-khat na pia ding uh hi.

Topana Pasian uh na zahtak tawntung nading uh na theih nadingun, ama min a ten nadingin a teelna munTopanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah na an uh, na leenggahzu uh, na sathau uh sawm-ah-khat le na bawnghon uh le na tuuhon tacilte uh na ne ding uh hi.TopaTopa

Topana Pasian un a min koih nadingin a teelna mun pen,Topana Pasian un no thupha hong piak ciangin note kiang panin gamla lua a, no adingin lam a sau luat manin sawm-ah-khat na paipih zawh kei uhleh,TopaTopa
tuate sum na suah ding uh a, a sumte tunin,Topana Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh a,Topa

na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheihzu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uh hi.Topana Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note le na innkuanpihte uh na lungdam ding uh hi.Topa
“Note bangin amaute in tanh le luah nei lo ahih manin na khua sung uha om Levi mite na mangngilh kei ding uh hi.
“Kum thum simin tua kum-a note’ anpiang sawm-ah-khat khempeuh hong pai khiatpihin na khua sung uhah na khol ding uh hi.

Topana Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nadingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo uh ahih manin note’ khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote le meigong numeite hong pai-in tua ante ne-in a gilvah ding uh hi.Topa
“Kum sagih a cin simin leiba maisakna na nei ding uh hi.

Maisak nading zia in: Leitawi a pia mi khempeuh in a veengte tungah leitawi a a piaksate maisak ding hi.Topa’maisakna thu kigen khin ahih manin a veengpa, a sanggampa’ tung pan kuamah in leiba siik nawn lo ding hi.Topa’
Gamdang mite’ tung pan na siik thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggamte uh tung panin no-a’ hong bat peuhmah na maisak ding uh hi.

“Ahih hangin tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh zui-inTopanote’ Pasian’ aw na ngaih nak-uhleh note’ lakah a zawng om lo ding hi (bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un na neih dingun gamhluahin hong piak leitang tungahTopain note thupha hong pia ding hi).TopaTopaTopa

Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un hong ciamsa bangin note thupha hong pia dinga, minam tampi tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in lei na tawi kei ding uh hi. Minam tampite na uk ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in note hong uk lo ding uh hi.Topa

“Topana Pasian un note hong piak gam sunga na khuate uh khat peuhpeuh sungah na sanggam khat uh note lakah a zawng a om leh na lungsim uh khauhsak loin, na sanggam zawng pa uh huh loin na om kei ding uh hi.Topa
Ama tungah na cingh gamtat ding uh a, bangbang hitaleh ama kisap zah na leitawi ding uh hi.

Na lungsim uhah ngaihsutna hoih lo omin, ‘Kum sagihna, maisakna kum hong nai hi,’ ci-in na sanggampa galmi et-in amah bangmah na piak loh uh ciangin na langkhat ahTopa’tungah amah kiko-in, no tungah khialhna a suahkhak ding kingaihsun un.Topa’
Citna tawh amah na pia ding uh a, amah na piak uh ciangin lungsim neihna na nei kei ding uh hi.Topana Pasian un na sepna na hihna khempeuh uhah hih thu hangin note thupha hong pia ding hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngei lo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah a om na sanggampa, na a kisam mite le mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding uh hi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.

“Na sanggampa, Hebru pasal khat ahi a, Hebru numei khat ahi zongin nang tungah hong kizuak leh, amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem dinga, a kum sagihna ciangin nang kiang panin a suakta-in na pai khiasak ding hi.
Na kiang panin a suakta-in na pai khiatsak ciangin khuthawm guakin na paisak kei ding hi.
Na tuuhon lak, na ancilna le na leenggah sukna panin citna tawh tampi na pia dinga,Topana Pasian in nang thupha hong piak zahin amah na pia ding hi.Topa
Egypt gamah sila na hihna uh leTopana Pasian un note hong suahtaksakna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih thu tuni-in kong pia hi.Topa
“Ahih hangin amah in note nuam hong sa-in, nang le na innkuanpihte hong it ahih manin ‘Nang kiang panin ka pai khia kei ding hi,’ hong cih leh,
phimpi khat la-in, kongkhak dapphahin a bil na vut dinga, na sila hi tawntung ding hi. Na sila numei zong tua bangmahin na hih ding hi.

Na kiang panin a suakta-in amah na paisak ciangin haksa sa kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh a kicial nasem thaman lang tawh amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem khinzo hi. Tua ahih cianginTopana Pasian un na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong pia ding hi.Topa

“Na bawnghon uh le na tuuhon uh panin tacil a pa khempeuhTopanote’ Pasian’ tungah na ap ding uh hi. Na bawnghon tacilte uh tawh na na sem kei ding uh a, na tuuhon tacilte uh zong a mul na met kei ding uh hi.Topa
Topain a teelna munah a kum kuminTopanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah na innkuanpihte uh tawh na ne ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Ahih hangin poina khatpeuh, a khebai a mittaw, ahih kei leh poina lian khat peuhpeuh a neih leh,Topanote’ Pasian’ tungah biakna-in na pia kei ding uh hi.Topa
Na khua sung uhah na ne ding uh hi. Sanang ahi a, sakhi ahi zongin a kinek bangin mi nin le mi siangte in a kibangin ne thei ding uh hi.
A si na ne kei bek ding uh a, tui bangin leilakah a si na bua khia ding uh hi.
“Abib kha tang unla,Topana Pasian uh adingin Paisan Pawi bawl un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abib kha sunginTopana Pasian un Egypt gam panin zanin note hong pai khiatpih hi.TopaTopa
Tuuhon pan ahi a, bawnghon pan ahi zonginTopain ama min om nadingin a teelna munah Paisan Pawi biakpiaknaTopana Pasian uh tungah na pia ding uh hi.TopaTopa

Silngo sawh anlum tawh na ne kei ding uh a, ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum, gimna anlum tawh na ne ding uh hi. Egypt gam panin nawhsa-in na tai khia uh hi. Egypt gam panin na taikhiat uh hun na nuntak sung tawntung uh na phawk theih nading uh ahi hi.
Na gam sung khempeuh uhah ni sagih sung note lakah silngo kimu lo ding hi. A ni masa nitakin biakpiakna-ah na piak uh sa khat peuhpeuh zong a zingsang dong zan tawntung na omsak kei ding uh hi.
“Topana Pasian un note hong piak khua khempeuh ah Paisan Pawi biakpiakna na pia thei kei ding uh hi.Topa
Topana Pasian un ama min om nadingin a teelna mun bekah ni a tum khit nitak, Egypt panin na pai khiat uh hunin Paisan Pawi biakpiakna na pia ding uh hi.Topa
Topana Pasian un a teelna munah huanin na ne ding uh a, zingsang ciangin na puanbukte uhah na ciah thei ding uh hi.Topa
Ni guk sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh a, a ni sagih ni-inTopana Pasian uh adingin a thupi kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi.Topa
“An na lak masak ni uh a kipanin nipikal sagih na simto ding uh hi.
Tua cianginTopana Pasian un note thupha hong piakna tawh kizui-in na piak ding uh ahi note’ khut sung panin utthu-a piakna tawhTopana Pasian uh tungah nipikal pawi na bawl ding uh hi.TopaTopa

Topana Pasian uh mai, ama min om nadinginTopana Pasian un a teelna munah, note a kipan na tanute le na tapate, na nasem numeite le na nasem pasalte, na khua sunga om Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote le note lakah a om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Egypt-ah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh a, hih thukhamte zuih ding limtakin na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
“Na ancilna uh le na leenggah sukna panun an na kaihkhop uh ciangin ni sagih sung buk pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
Tua pawi sungah nang a kipan na tanute le na tapate, na nasem numeite le na nasem pasalte, Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote le na khua sunga om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.

Topain a teelna munah ni sagih sungTopana Pasian uh tungah pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note na lungdam khawm theih nadingun na khawhsa uh le na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhahTopana Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.TopaTopaTopa

“Amah in a teelna mun,Topana Pasian uh mai-ah pasal khempeuh kum khatin thumvei, silngo sawh loh anlum pawi, nipikal pawi le buk pawi-ah kilaak ding uh hi. Amaute khut hawmguakinTopa’mai-ah kilak lo ding uh hi.Topana Pasian un note thupha hong piaknasa tawh kizui-in mi khempeuh in ama hih theih bang ciatin pia ding uh hi.TopaTopa’Topa
“Na minam uh tawh kizui-inTopana Pasian un note hong piakna khuate-ah thukhente le uliante na koih ding uh a, amaute in a manin mite tungah thu khen ding uh hi.Topa
Thutang na hei khia kei ding uh a, angvan tuam na nei kei ding uh hi. Sumgolh in mipilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu hei khia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi.
Note nungta-inTopana Pasian un hong piak leitang na luah theih nadingun a thuman bekbekin na gamta ding uh hi.Topa
“Note in na bawlsa uh ahi,Topana Pasian uh biakna tau kiangah Asherah milim dingin khuam khat peuhpeuh na phut kei ding uh hi.Topa
Topana Pasian un a muhdah biakna songpi na phut kei ding uh hi.Topa

“Bawng ahi a, tuu ahi zongin, poina a nei, kisapna khat peuhpeuh a om peuhmahTopanote’ Pasian’ tungah biakpiakna-in na pia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua penTopanote’ Pasian adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.TopaTopa
“Topanote’ Pasian in note hong piak khua khat peuhpeuh sungah numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, ama thuciamna palsatin,Topana Pasian uh muhna-ah a sia-in a gamtatna kimu-in,TopaTopa
pasian dangte’ na semin tuate bia ahi zongin, keimah in ka kham ahi ni ahi a, kha ahi a, vantung na khat peuhpeuhte’ na semin bia ahi zongin,
no kiangah hong kigenin tua thu na zak uhleh, note in limtakin na kantel ding uh a, Israel-te sungah tua bang a kihhuai na a kigamtatna thu a om mah ahih takpi leh,
numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin tua banga a sia-in a gamta mi pen na khua pua uhah na paipih ding uh a, tua numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin suang tawh na denglum ding uh hi.
Teci nih ahih kei leh thum bang genna tawh a si ding pa kithat dinga, teci khat bek thugenna tawh mi kithat lo ding hi.
A that dingin tecite masa dinga, tua khit ciangin midang khempeuh in hih ding uh hi. Tua bangin note’ sung panin hoih lohna na siangsak ding uh hi.

“Mi khatlekhat kithah khakna, khatlekhat thu kituhna, mi khatlekhat kisatna, note adingin a haksalua thu khat peuhpeuh note’ khua sungah khen ding hong om leh, note kithawi-inTopana Pasian un a teelna mun,Topa
Levi siampite le tua huna thukhente kiangah pai-in thu na dong ding uh a, amaute in note kiangah thukhen nading hong gen ding uh hi.
Tua cianginTopain a teelna mun panin note’ tungah hong gen bangun na hih ding uh hi. Amaute in note tungah hong lah bangin limtakin na hih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh a,Topa
amaute in note tungah hong piak thuhilhna le note tungah hong gen uh thukhensatna tawh kizui-in na hih ding uh hi. Amaute in note tungah hong gen bang teekteekin na hih ding uh hi.

Topanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah nasem dingin a ding siampipa’ thu ahi a, thukhen pa’ thu ahi zongin man lohna tawh a khengvala a gamta mi peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Tua bangin Israel-te’ sung panin hoih lohna na siangsak ding uh hi.Topa
Tua hileh mi khempeuh in za-in, kihta-in, a khengvalin gamta ngam nawn lo ding uh hi.

“Topana Pasian un note hong piak leitangah tungin, note in tua leitang nei-in a tungah na ten uh ciangin, ‘Eite’ kimkota om minamte khempeuh mah bangin eite’ tungah kumpi khat i koih ding hi,’ na ci nuam kha ding uh hi.Topa

Topanote’ Pasian in a teel mipa note’ tungah kumpi-in na koih thei takpi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin na mipihte bek uh lak panin kumpi-in mi khat na koih ding uh a, na sanggam uh ahi lo gamdang mi khat no’ tungah na koih thei kei ding uh hi.Topa

Amah in ama aituam dingin sakol tampi nei lo ding hi.Topain no kiangah, ‘Hih lampi tawnin na kilehkik ngei kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci ahih manin, amah in sakolte a lei dingin Egypt gamah mite paisak lo ding hi.Topa
A lungsim hei khia kha ding ahih manin zi la thuah lo dinga, ama adingin ngun le kham zong nakpitakin behlap lo ding hi.
Ama kumpi tokhom tungah a tut ciangin Levi siampite’ kep hih thukhamte ama adingin laibu khat sungah gelh ding hi.

Hih thukham sunga thute le hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawhTopaa Pasian zahtak ding a theih nading, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak loh nading, thupiaknate them khat zong a pelh loh nading le Israel-te sung ahi ama kumpi gam sungah amah le a tate saupi a om theih nadingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi.Topa
“Siampi ahi Levi minam khempeuh in Israel-te bangin tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo ding uh a, amaute inTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biaknate le a kaih ngeite uh ne ding uh hi.Topa’
Amaute in a sanggamte uh lakah gamhluah nei lo ding uh a, amah in amaute tungah a ciam mah banginTopapen amaute’ luah ahi hi.Topa
“Bawng hitaleh tuu hitaleh biakna-in a pia mite’ tung panin siampite’ kaih dingte: Amaute in siampite’ tungah a liang le a paang nihte le a gilpi pia ding uh hi.
Na anpal, na leenggahzu, na sathau le na meet masak uh na tuumul uh na pia ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi minamteTopa’na a sem tawntung dingin na minam khempeuh uh sung paninTopana Pasian un a teel ahi hi.Topa’Topa
“Levi mi khat, Israel-te sung na khuapi uh khat peuhpeuh ahi ama tenna panin ama ut hun peuh cianginTopa’teelna munah hong pai thei ding hi.Topa’
Tua cianginTopa’mai-ah nasem dingin a om a lawm Levi midangte khempeuh mah banginTopaa Pasian’ min tawh na sem thei ding hi.Topa’Topa
Amah in a gamhluah a zuakna pan a sum ngahte banah nek ding a kikimin amaute tawh tanh ngahkhawm ding hi.
“Topana Pasian un note hong piak leitangah na tun uh ciangin, tua minamte’ gamtatna a kihhuaite zuih ding na kisin kei ding uh hi.Topa
Note lakah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a zang, ai a saan, khong a khai, mailam thu a gen, ai a tawi,
bum a zang, van a kah, sikhate tawh a kiho, sikha thu a dong kuamah na om kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte a hih mi peuhmahTopaadingin a kihhuai ahi hi. Hih bang a kihhuai gamtatnate hangin note’ mai paninTopana Pasian un amaute hawl khia hi.TopaTopa
Note penTopana Pasian uh mai-ah paubaang loin na om ding uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh note in na suankhiat ding uh hih minamte in khongkhaite le aisante thu ngai uh hi. Ahih hangin note na hih uhleh tua bangin na gamtat ding uhTopana Pasian un hong phal lo hi.Topa
“Topana Pasian un note lak ahi na sanggamte uh lak panin note adingin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong khangsak ding hi. Note in ama thu na ngai ding uh hi.Topa

“Note in, ‘Si kha ding ka hih manunTopakote’ Pasian’ aw hong zasakkik kei in. Hih a lian mei zong hong musak nawn kei in,’ ci-in na kikhop ni-un Horeb-ahTopana Pasian uh tung pan na deih bang uh hi ding hi.TopaTopa
Topain kei kiangah, ‘Amaute’ hong ngetna thuman taktak hi.Topa
Amau sanggamte lak panin nang tawh a kibang kamsang khat amaute adingin ka khangsak ding hi. Ama gen dingte ka hilh dinga, amah ka thupiak khempeuh amaute tungah a gen ding hi.
Amah in keima min tawh a gen ka thute a don lo mi peuhmahte kei mahmah in ka thuk ding hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in thugen dingin thu pia lo napi-in keima min tawh thu a gen ngam kamsangpa hitaleh pasian dangte’ min tawh thu a gen pa hitaleh, tua bang mite si ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Na lungsim sung uhah, ‘Topa’gen ahi lo thu bangci theih ding ihi hiam?’ na cih uhleh,Topa’

kamsang khat inTopa’min tawh thu genin, tua thu pen hong tung lo ahi a, a man lo ahi zongin hong hih leh, tua thu penTopa’gen loh thu ahi hi. Kamsangpa in ama utthu a gen hi a, amah na kihtak ding uh kul lo hi.Topa’Topa’
“Topana Pasian un amaute’ leitang note hong piak minamte beisakin, note in amaute suankhia-in, amaute’ khuapite le innte-ah na ten uh ciangin,Topa
Topana Pasian un note’ neih dingin hong piak gam sungah note adingin khuapi thum na tuamkoih ding uh hi.Topa
Mi a thatkha peuhpeuh a tai theih nadinginTopana Pasian un na neih dingun a hong piak leitang seh thumin khenin seh khat sungah khuapi khat ciat koihin a lampite na puah ding uh hi.Topa

Mi khat sing a phuk dingin a veengpa tawh gamlakah pai-in, sing a phuk dingin a khut tawh a hei vaanin, a heitang a ga panin kikhongin a veengpa kha-in a sih bang danin, mi khat in sawm lohpi, a beisa hunah amah tawh kigal neihna om lopi-in a veengpa a sihsak khak leh, hih khuapite khat peuhpeuhah amah tai-in a nuntakna hu thei ding hi.

Tua bang hikeileh, amah in a beisa hunah a veengpa tawh kigal neihna nei lo ahih manin sih nading thu om lo napi-in, a hehna tawh phula nuampa in mi that khapa delhin lampi a gamlatna hangin amah pha-in a si dingin liamsak kha ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, khuapi thum tuamkoih un, ci-in note thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

“Note inTopana Pasian uh itin, ama lampi zuih tawntungna tawh tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uh a, amah in na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciam mah banginTopana Pasian un na gamgite uh hong keeksakin, na pu na pate uh piak dingin a ciam leitang note tungah hong piak leh, hih khuapi thum banah khuapi thum mah na behlap ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Tua hikeilehTopana Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitang tungah mawhbaang lo mi kithat kha dinga, tua mi thahna hanga mawhna note’ tungah hong tu ding hi.Topa
“Ahih hangin mi khat in a veengpa mudahin, amah pangsim a, amah satin liamsakin a sihsak a, tua mipa hih khuapi khat peuhpeuhah a tai leh,
ama khua upate in amah hong puakin hong paipih ding uh a, a sih theih nadingin phulapa tungah ap ding uh hi.
Note na nopsak theih nadingun amah hehpih loin, Israel-te sung panin mi that pa na beisak ding uh hi.
